subject: Request, RunnerBuilder, Computer and @RunWith
msgSnippet: Using a RunnerBuilder and a Computer, the JUNIT 4.7 Request class creates the Runner object. I am currently using @RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class) (from
messageBody:
Using a RunnerBuilder and a Computer, the JUNIT 4.7 Request class creates the Runner object.

I am currently using @RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class) (from spring 3.0 rc) and I'm trying to shoehorn parallel running into this regime, but it seems to me like these two designs are now fairly orthogonal. I suppose it could have been solved by amending a "Computer" to the @RunWith tag, and I also suppose I may be trying to solve this problem at the incorrect level.

Anyone have any thoughts/suggestions on this one ?

Kristian Rosenvold
